author: _shemnon
content: I'm trying to get goEVMLab updated for fuzzing and this is pusing one issue for traces: do we do PC + Section for EOF or do we just do a PC relative to a fixed point (code section zero or container root?). I'm OK with either and adding section to GoEVMLab won't be too hard, but if clients all want the base-indexed PC we won't need it.  So quick poll: 0Ô∏è‚É£ - based off a fixed point üî¢ PC+section, and zero to section
